section.title: Perl Compatible Regular Expressions
section.para: This is an interface to Perl Compatible Regular Expressions.
section.simpara: When this module is present, &features-my; contains the symbol :PCRE.

listitem.simpara: Return version information as 3 values: descriptive &string-t; and 2 &fixnum-t;s: major and minor numbers.

listitem.para: Return some information about the PCRE build configuration. &type-r; is one of :UTF8 :NEWLINE :LINK-SIZE :POSIX-MALLOC-THRESHOLD :MATCH-LIMIT

listitem.simpara: Compile a pattern, optionally study it.

listitem.para: Return some information about the &pattern-r;, such as :OPTIONS :SIZE :CAPTURECOUNT :BACKREFMAX :FIRSTBYTE :FIRSTTABLE :LASTLITERAL :NAMEENTRYSIZE :NAMECOUNT :NAMETABLE :STUDYSIZE

listitem.simpara: Convert the name of the sub-pattern to an index in the return vector.

Execute the compiled &pattern-r; against the &string-r; at the given &offset-r; with the given options. Returns &nil; if no matches or a &vector-t; of &length; CAPTURECOUNT+1 of PCRE:MATCH structures, unless :BOOLEAN was non-&nil;, in which case return &t; as an indicator of success, but do not allocate anything.
:DFA argument determines whether pcre_dfa_exec is used instead of pcre_exec (PCRE v6 and better).
:WORK-SPACE is only used for :DFA and defaults to 20.
Return the start and end of the &match-r;. &setf;-able.
Return the substring of &string-r; bounded by &match-r;.
Return all substrings for all matches found by PCRE:PCRE-EXEC.
Return the substring that matches the given sub-pattern. If which is a name of the sub-pattern (as opposed to its number), &pattern-r; must be supplied.
